backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor handling contact inquiries, user profiles, and authorization checks with public endpoints for submitting inquiries and retrieving contact details.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report documenting feature requirements, affected files, components, and test IDs for Instagram-related UI updates.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for various frontend source files and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base configuration defining root CSS variables for light and dark themes and global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML template setting metadata, dynamic canonical/OG URLs, and loading the React entrypoint.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots.txt allowing all user agents and referencing the sitemap.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: Static sitemap listing key site URLs with change frequency and priority placeholders.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with core site routes using a shared layout component.
frontend/src/components/site/ContactDeta: UI component fetching and displaying contact details, computing website URL, and providing copy-to-clipboard sharing.
frontend/src/components/site/CoverageSec: Displays Europe-wide and international coverage details with icons and descriptive text.
Three-step delivery process component using cards and icons to illustrate workflow.
frontend/src/components/site/MarketingCa: Reusable card component displaying an icon, title, and description with styling.
frontend/src/components/site/Section.tsx: Wrapper component that renders a padded section with a container and optional id.
frontend/src/components/site/ServicesPre: Displays a grid of service marketing cards and a button linking to the full services page.
Footer with branding, navigation links, service list, contact info, and copyright text.
Header with logo, desktop and mobile navigation, and contact button using a responsive sheet menu.
Page layout including header, routed content via Outlet, and footer.
Grid of marketing cards highlighting key value propositions like speed, security, and support.
frontend/src/components/site/VideoSectio: Section showing an Instagram promo header and an embedded video with fallback image on error.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity and invalidates dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, login flow, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitInquiry.ts: Mutation hook that validates inquiry data and submits it via the backend actor, then invalidates cache.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers, custom theme variables for light and dark modes, and utility classes including a complex hero background style.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with company overview, mission, values, and supporting imagery.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Implements a contact form with validation, submission handling, and displays contact details.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the homepage with a hero section, value props, video section, services preview, and a call‑to‑action.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Shows a services overview, how‑it‑works section, and additional service details using marketing components.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, storing them in sessionStorage, and clearing them from the URL hash. Supports both query-string and hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme colors, typography, animations, and plugins for the frontend. Includes container settings, custom color tokens, and extended utilities.
frontend/VIDEO_ASSET.md: Instructions detailing where video and fallback assets must be placed in the frontend and how they are served.
project_state.json: Describes the current project state, requirements, known issues, and planned features for the KK Euro Express website. Tracks architectural notes, service updates, and configuration problems like video upload failures.
